author: wajidalikhan
body:
#### PR description:
- This is a back-port to CMSSW_141X for the PR [https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44038](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44038) which incorporates 
- PFMet and PuppiMET do not have the same  variables stored in NanoAOD, consistent variables to be stored in both the PFMET and PuppiMET at the NanoAOD for next data taking
- Remove / Rename some of the other relevant branches 

- Had to do the cherry picking of the [https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44038/commits](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44038/commits) because unknown issues
title: PFMet and PuppiMET Branches: Backport to CMSSW_141X
